name: Retur
description:
This is my first game. It was made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 in one week

At the moment there is only one level and no music, but i will try too add those in the future

Controls

WASD - Movement

G - Throw Turret

Turrets shoot bullets at enemies. A enemie will get rewinded if it is hit by a bullet.

While it is rewinding it cannot aim at you

Your goal is to go to the pink point on the map without dying

You are the yellow point

Not rewinding enemies are red squares and rewinding enemies are green squares
